CANDIDATE_MOVE_COORDINATES - Static variable in class com.chess.engine.pieces.Pawn
An array of all the candidate moves that a pawn is allowed to do /!\ A Pawn can't always do all of these moves
CANDIDATE_MOVE_VECTOR_COORDINATES - Static variable in class com.chess.engine.pieces.Bishop
A move vector for the bishop : as it uses the diagonals, the bishop can move in +7, +14, +21; +9, +18, +27; -7, -14, -21; -9, -18, -27, ...
CANDIDATE_MOVE_VECTOR_COORDINATES - Static variable in class com.chess.engine.pieces.Queen
A move vector for the queen : as it uses the columns, lines and diagonals, the queen can move in +1, +2, +3; +8, +16, +24; -1, -2, -3; -8, -16, -24; +7, +14, +21; +9, +18, +27; -7, -14, -21; -9, -18, -27, ...
CANDIDATE_MOVE_VECTOR_COORDINATES - Static variable in class com.chess.engine.pieces.Rook
A move vector for the rook : as it uses the columns and lines, the rook can move in +1, +2, +3; +8, +16, +24; -1, -2, -3; -8, -16, -24, ...
CANDIDATE_MOVES - Static variable in class com.chess.engine.pieces.King
An array of all the candidate moves that a king is allowed to do /!\ A king can't always do all of these moves
